title: Pezroly
author: Pezroly
created_time: March 17, 2023, 08:19:11 PMLast edit: March 17, 2023, 08:49:43 PM by Pezroly
content: If you use browser altcoin wallet, like MetaMask or TronLink, good antivirus is needed, especially for phishing protection. Windows Defender in Windows 10, 11 is not enough.Consider Avast Free Antivirus for example - https://www.avast.com/en-gb/index#pc and https://forum.avast.com/index.php?board=2.0.See this thread for example ( phone version of Metamask ) - How my MetaMask was hacked and how to protect your crypto - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5433428.0
